trans-unit.target: TEXT_CLSTHM001_00183_YAYAKE_000_1<tab>Welcome to the Thaumaturges' Guild. It is fate that has guided your steps here, friend.
TEXT_CLSTHM001_00183_YAYAKE_000_2<tab>Within these hallowed halls, the arts of devastation are taught─primeval magicks with which to bring about an enemy's ruin.
TEXT_CLSTHM001_00183_YAYAKE_000_3<tab>If you would join our ranks and wield the power of thaumaturgy, I urge you to seize this moment and confide in me your arcane ambitions.
TEXT_CLSTHM001_00183_Q1_000_1<tab>Do you wish to join the Thaumaturges' Guild?
TEXT_CLSTHM001_00183_A1_000_1<tab>Yes
TEXT_CLSTHM001_00183_A1_000_2<tab>No
TEXT_CLSTHM001_00183_YAYAKE_000_11<tab>Your denial is most unsettling!
TEXT_CLSTHM001_00183_YAYAKE_000_12<tab>Ah, but I see the stars were not yet aligned. Your time will come, and I shall be waiting.

TEXT_CLSTHM001_00183_YAYAKE_000_21<tab>...I fear my words of destiny and desire were spoken in haste. Your aura bespeaks a certain...unpreparedness, as if your spirit is reluctant to abandon a path yet freshly begun.
TEXT_CLSTHM001_00183_YAYAKE_000_22<tab>Pray continue down that path until a fork presents itself. Perhaps the choice you then make shall lead you back to the gates of thaumaturgy.
TEXT_CLSTHM001_00183_SYSTEM_000_23<tab>Before you can take up another discipline, you must first complete the level 10 quest of your starting class.
TEXT_CLSTHM001_00183_YAYAKE_000_31<tab>Yes. There truly was no other answer, was there? Lean closer now, and I shall whisper to you of thaumaturgy's beginnings.
TEXT_CLSTHM001_00183_YAYAKE_000_32<tab>The nation of Ul'dah inherited its traditions from ancient Belah'dia, a city founded by the descendants of the first mages.

TEXT_CLSTHM001_00183_YAYAKE_000_33<tab>The secrets of these illustrious sorcerers were ultimately entrusted to the priests of the Order of Nald'thal, who have passed them down from generation to generation ever since.

TEXT_CLSTHM001_00183_YAYAKE_000_34<tab>Focused and refined over centuries of use in the Order's funereal rites, the arcane magicks of our ancestors eventually emerged as the art we now know as thaumaturgy.

TEXT_CLSTHM001_00183_YAYAKE_000_35<tab>A freezing blizzard to halt corruption; a raging fire to cleanse the corpse; a bolt of lightning to expel the sins of mortal life... The dweomers employed in the preparation of the dead are equally efficacious when applied to the living.
TEXT_CLSTHM001_00183_YAYAKE_000_36<tab>Thus does our guild thrive in the depths of Arrzaneth Ossuary─a sanctuary devoted to Thal, the divine arbiter of the afterlife.
TEXT_CLSTHM001_00183_YAYAKE_000_37<tab>What say you, then, adventurer? If you would plumb the abyssal depths of thaumaturgy, let our learned sages guide your descent!

TEXT_CLSTHM001_00183_YAYAKE_000_38<tab>Ah, but before you leap into the darkness, you must prove to our guildmasters that you are possessed of the spiritual fortitude necessary to look upon that which waits therein.
TEXT_CLSTHM001_00183_YAYAKE_000_39<tab>When you are ready to submit to the judgment of our most eminent mages, say the word.
